description: This table contains any free text comments about anesthesia special needs in the case record.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ANES_FREETEXT
columns.description: This column contains any free text comments that have been made about anesthesia special needs in the case record.
